title: How to Farm Battle Points in Mobile Legends: Bang Bang

steps.title: Rank Up to Legend or Mythic.
steps.content: Rank Up to Legend or Mythic. Every ranked game rewards you Battle Points, but you also get up to 20,000 worth of BPs every season as a reward when you achieve Legend or Mythic as the season ends. Take it as an advantage to earn more heroes or get free emblems.

steps.title: Keep a good credit score.
steps.content: Keep a good credit score. Your Credit Score depends on how responsible you are when playing the game. Do not go AFK, be toxic to your teammates, or intentionally feed. When the system detects that you are ruining the game experience for others, it will deduct your credit score and not give you battle rewards. Having the highest credit score of 110 increases the weekly BP limit up to 8,500 BPs weekly. If you currently have Credit Scores less than 100, each successful match gives 1 point. For 100 Credit Scores and above, each 7 successful non-AFK match gives 1 point.

steps.title: Activate double Battle Point Time and Win cards.
steps.content: Activate double Battle Point Time and Win cards. There are 2 types of double BP cards that can be used in-game: double BP time and double BP wins. You can activate the two at the same time allowing you to get up to 3x the battle points each game if you win. These don't only speed up BP farming by adding 100% additional BPs after every match. They also increase the weekly BP limit by +1,500. That means a weekly limit of up to 10,000 BPs with a double BP card and 110 Credit Scores. Make sure to only use the double BP card with a maximum credit score, or your weekly BP limit may not increase to 10,000. Double BP Cards can be obtained from in-game events such as the Mentorship Program, and Starlight Membership.

steps.title: Play VS AI Brawl until you max out your weekly Battle Point limit.
steps.content: Play VS AI Brawl until you max out your weekly Battle Point limit. VS AI Brawls are easy to win and end very quickly. It is the fastest game mode in-game rewarding you up to 100 BPs per game for only 2 minutes of game time on average. Aim at the turrets to end the game quickly.

steps.title: Open a free chest every 4 hours.
steps.content: Open a free chest every 4 hours. Free chests can contain BPs. They may be stacked when you go idle for some time, but can be useful!

steps.title: Finish medal chests every day.
steps.content: Finish medal chests every day. Medal chests may contain 200-250 BPs. To get the chest right away, try to do some good performances (pushing the turrets or getting a good killing streak) to grab a chest right away.

steps.title: Do daily tasks.
steps.content: Do daily tasks. Daily tasks grant up to 230 BPs every day and can accumulate weekly and open a weekly activity chest. Weekly activity chests give 500 BPs every week.

steps.title: Use trial cards for heroes and skins you already own.
steps.content: Use trial cards for heroes and skins you already own. Since you already own them, they will automatically convert to BPs. Keep those trial cards and refrain from using them until you finally get the hero or skin.

steps.title: Spin the free lucky spin.
steps.content: Spin the free lucky spin. There is a chance of winning BPs in the lucky spin, however in a small amount. You should earn as many tickets as possible if you are relying on this option.
